divs: sighting detailsafter yesterday morning "white starlike object" moving straight up and then to the east, moving far away, then closer, then disappearing i woke up at 4:50 am this morning and looked out the window to see three "pulsating red and blue" "start" hovering lower than the real stars in the dark, crystal clear sky. the real stars are mostly higher in the sky and stationary the whole time. these three "pulsating, hovering lower stars" are about parallel to each other, one to the left and one to the right (about nine feet ground distance measurement, and the third "pulsating star" is about 3\4 the distance, between the two others, closer to the one on the right. but the "center" one is larger and brighter because i believe it is actually closer to me. about 20 minutes later i look again....the larger, center "star" is gone. the two others are still in the same position, one left (south) and one right (more west). at about 5:50 am i look again, and just then i see the one on the left, above a garden center building here, start to "disappear." it happens in a second, but suddenly gets very, very tiny and "the light goes out!!" it's gone!! it either just "disappeared" or it moved swiftly in a paralell (not up or down direction...and disappeared) all the other real stars are still very bright, same position, no cloud cover!! the "pulsating star" on the right is still about the same postion, about the same distance and size. at about 5:50 am i started watching the last "star" on the right because it was about the same spot the "star" yesterday was positioned in the sky when i saw it move straight up!" from 5:50 am until about 6:45 am i watched this one from inside and outside. it is about 9 degrees out this morning!! at about 6:00 am i noticed this one started to move "inches down first, then up, then about 6:15 am it moved parallel...but away from me toward the west. at that time an airplane moved across the sky from north going south, between my view and the object. about fifteen minutes later, the "star" moved again closer toward my direction, got larger, still moving parallel, not up or down. then it moved "inches up and down," because the view was obscured by the trees, so i had to go outside to see it was still there. then about 6:35 am it began to move westerly, and "disappeared," just as the second one to the left, over the garden center building had done. just sort of becomes quickly "like a little dot, then lights out!!" from new york.....my sister called my time 6:10 pm (here time 7:10 pm to tell me she just had "another encounter" with this time a "bright white object with crystal like lights all around it, and beams of light from it" on the same road by my parent's house that we had the "close encounter" with the "spaceship with red and blue flashing lights" on july 11, 2007. she saw it over a friend's house, in the distance in the sky, about a mile up the road, and about a mile from our house. as she continued to drive she noticed "it was not over her, but was traveling parallel with her up the road." at one point just before getting to the house, "a light, like moonlight came into her vehicle through the moonroof on her car." at first when she called she sounded more "excited" than scared to me and i was surprized, after the terrifying experience in july. later when i spoke to her she said she felt "energized" and perhaps it was from the adrenelin from being scared. now talking about it, she was really scared again. she is moving very soon, but i don't think she is moving far enough away. honestly, with seeing these things out here also, i don't know where you can "move to!" we are hoping they are some sort of our military or government "top secret" security efforts. i wish they would tell us. this is a little scarey. now i have to keep watching!!
